title: 23rd June 1314: The Battle of Bannockburn begins, resulting in a victory for Robert the Bruce against Edward II
itunes:summary: Bannockburn was unusual for a medieval battle in that it lasted for two days, with the first day being notable for Bruce single-handedly killing the young English knight Sir Henry de Bohun with an axe blow to the head after he tried to charge him with a ...
